overview_of_class: This course is designed to give students producing, interviewing and anchoring experience. You will learn how to "line produce" a traditional newscast using the type of software that television newsrooms use. In addition, you will get in-depth interviewing experience in the context of field and public affairs show producing.
name: TV News Producing and Performance
title: JOUR JOUR 413-0-20 TV News Producing and Performance
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Only students in the MSJ program may enroll in these classes

descriptions.name: Overview of class

You will learn how to "line produce" a traditional newscast using the type of software that television newsrooms use. In addition, you will get in-depth interviewing experience in the context of field and public affairs show producing.
